short_summary: Bring back _Walpole Island Swing Bridge_ to a state of good repair for the Department of Public Works and Government Services following the completion of a series of rehabilitation work
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a federal contractor's service agreement to deliver repairs to the swing bridge on Walpole Island. The repairs will include the rehabilitation of the control panel and tower. Work on the project will include preparing the necessary design and purchase requisitions, obtaining the necessary permits, performing load calculations, and completing the repairs. All necessary construction services will be delivered by the contractor. The contractor is expected to utilize local content if possible, and at a minimum 10% of the total tender amount must be set aside for local content.
duration_in_months: We will repair the Walpole Island Swing Bridge to ensure the structure is sound and safe. This requires a federal contractor's service agreement for repairs to the swing bridge. Contractors must exhibit their ability to provide a comprehensive  rehabilitated bridge including appropriate replacements for structural deficiency
